item.title: Should Luka Garza be a First-Round NBA Draft pick?
item.description: I was doing a little bit of research over the potential draft prospects and I noticed that Luka Garza wasn’t ranked as high as I thought he would be. For those who don’t know, Garza is currently ranked no. 1 in College Men’s Basketball. He is projected to be in the late-first to mid-second round of NBA draft picks. How is it possible that Luka Garza is currently ranked no.

item.title: Cleaning up Data
item.description: I am going to complete an assignment in which we are cleaning data and using it to prove an objective through the application of code and creating data visuals to come to an overall conclusion. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.
